name: Tuarga's Tales
description: Tuarga's Tales is a 2d dungeon game where you play as Tuarga, a guy how has had his favourite thing stolen from him, Baklava, by the evil demon lord Markarth. To reclaim what was yours you must fight through his legions of skeletons and trolls in order to reach him in his lair, the Volcano of Terror! With retro style graphics this game will reignite some nostalgia in older players and serve as a steeping stone to older games to  younger players.
